bill.title: Notification; Silver Alert Program
bill.description: Creates and implements a silver alert program to be operated concurrently with the Maile Amber Alert program, to be activated on behalf of a missing senior citizen in the appropriate county. Effective July 1, 2020. (HB744 HD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to HUS, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Monday, 02-02-09 8:10am in conference room 329.

(H) The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Brower, Belatti, Bertram, Nishimoto, Yamane, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Shimabukuro.
(H) Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 41) as amended in HD 1.
(H) Recommends recommittal to HUS.
(H) HD 1 adopted and recommitted to HUS for further consideration with none voting no and Representative(s) Awana, Takai, Wakai excused.
(H) Re-referred to HUS, FIN, referral sheet 10
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Thursday, 02-12-09 8:00am in House conference room 329.

(H) The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Brower, Bertram, Yamane, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Carroll, Nishimoto, Shimabukuro.
(H) Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 323), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Bertram, Takai, Takumi excused (3).
Carried over to 2010 Regular Session.
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-19-10 10:00AM in House conference room 308.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-22-10.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Monday, 02-22-10 4:35PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Brower, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, C. Lee, Nishimoto, Sagum, Tokioka, Wooley, Yamashita, Finnegan, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 605-10) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-02-10.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 164).
